channel.title: Home on Feed The Leader
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Feed The Leader

item.title: 1. You shall love the leader above all things
2. You shall not take the name of the leader in vain
3. You shall sanctify the victories of the regime
4. You shall honor the leader and his decisions
5. You shall not kill, unless commanded by the leader
6. You shall not commit impure acts, nor make slanderous or libelous remarks about the leader
7. You shall not steal, unless commanded by the leader
8. You shall not lie, unless commanded by the leader
9. You shall not think outside the established, unless commanded by the leader
10. You shall not covet your neighbor's goods, unless required by the leader's political agenda
Download me!
item.description: Currently, Feed The Leader can only be run on a computer running the Windows operating system. In the near future, we hope to deploy the leader's ideology on other platforms. To download it, click the button above. Installation is very simple. If you follow these steps, you won’t get lost. I assure you. Download the file from the button above. You will see that a zip file has been downloaded.

item.title: Who are we?
item.description: About us JAJERJE studios is a small group made up of seven members born out of the need to fulfill a project for the course Introduction to Software Engineering. Faced with the question of what project to undertake and the indecision that plagued us, we decided (to try) to create a clicker in Unity. We had never used Unity or C#, but we still accepted the challenge. The result is what you can try on this very webpage by going to the download section!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Talk to those close to the leader! Do you want to have a word with some of the most loyal followers of the regime? Don’t worry! You can always contact us via our email developer@jajerje.fun. We will be happy to answer your questions, receive your suggestions, or simply chat about the greatness of our leader! Our social networks Unfortunately, we are scheming to acquire the usernames @FeedTheLeader on various platforms, but they are currently occupied.
